mapper.select:
select A.* FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY FREE_SEQ DESC) RNUM, F.* FROM ( SELECT FREE_SEQ, FREE_TITLE, FREE_CONTENTS, USERS_NAME, FREE_WRT_DATE, FREE_CNT, FILES_SEQ FROM FREE WHERE 1 = 1
AND FREE_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND FREE_CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY FREE_SEQ DESC ) F ) A WHERE A.RNUM BETWEEN (#{currentPage} * 10) - (10 - 1) AND (#{currentPage} * 10)
mapper.insert: insert into FREE (FREE_SEQ, USERS_ID, USERS_NAME, FREE_TITLE, FREE_CONTENTS, FILES_SEQ) values(FREE_SEQ.nextval, #{usersId}, #{usersName}, #{freeTitle}, #{freeContents}, #{filesSeq})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FREE A LEFT OUTER JOIN FILES B ON A.FILES_SEQ = B.FILES_SEQ WHERE FREE_SEQ = #{freeSeq}
mapper.update: update FREE set FREE_CNT = FREE_CNT + 1 where FREE_SEQ = #{freeSeq}
update FREE set FREE_TITLE = #{freeTitle}, FREE_CONTENTS = #{freeContents} where FREE_SEQ = #{freeSeq}
